## arrWinner() function

提取数组中最符合条件的元素 O(n)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function arrWinner<T>(arr: Iterable<T>, compareFn: (winner: T, next: T) => T, filter?: (item: T) => boolean): T | null;
```
